Lines.Speech: [i]Screeching fills the cave, as the spider reaches your position and swings a claw to strike towards Yuu.
[i]The strike would have hit, if not for that fact that Yuu grabbed your arm and pulled you in front of her. The claw renders a scrape across your chestpiece.

Lines.Speaker: GLADOS
Lines.Speech:
OH _HELL _NO. She did not just do that.__

Oi Yuu. What the heck!

Lines.Speaker: Agent Scully
Lines.Speech: You know she can't hear you, plus it saved her life. Eyes up Glados, we have a spider to dispatch.

Lines.Speaker: GLADOS
Lines.Speech: But my beautiful paint job! I'm never going to look the same again... you know, until we get back to the repairs dock. Ooo, perhaps it's time for a different colour!
[i]As you roll your eyes, a long blade extension shoots out of your arm as you swing across the width of the spider. It comically and perfectly slides apart a second later.

Lines.Speaker: Yuu
Lines.Speech: Nice one Scull! You really showed that spider eh?

Lines.Speaker: Agent Scully
Lines.Speech: I guess so. Come on, Yuu. We have to find the crystal.
[i]*Yuu tilts her head to the side, looking confused.*

Lines.Speaker: Agent Scully
Lines.Speech: The Mandaryan Crystal? The whole reason any of us are down in this forsaken place?

Lines.Speaker: Yuu
Lines.Speech: Haha yeah just messing with ya! _I only got this far into the cave before the spider attacked us. Went straight for me it did. Not happy about that.

Lines.Speaker: GLADOS
Lines.Speech: She's actually worse than useless, aghhh!

Lines.Speaker: Agent Scully
Lines.Speech: Come on Yuu. We have to go deeper.

Lines.Speaker: Yuu
Lines.Speech: Right behind you... plus another ten meters.
